channel.title: Xmpp no longer works via tor
channel.description: Tried many xmpp servers. I get 'ssl handshake failed' error. The same concerns oftc irc. It does not work. Own xmpp server also does not run via HS. It seems software nowadays is built with antitor code.

item.title: Xmpp no longer works via tor
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is almost certainly no anti Tor code when you install packages from Debian.
I would speculate it’s server issues or servers blocking Tor users, which is another story.

Read full topic
item.source: Xmpp no longer works via tor

item.title: Xmpp no longer works via tor
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

XMPP over Pidgin for example, as well as pretty much any other message protocol, does normally work for me, furthermore details on this are actually explained here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Chat Mind reimporting the Gateway and Workstation, to see, were the problem may lie?

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Xmpp no longer works via tor

item.title: Xmpp no longer works via tor
item.dc:creator: xin
item.description:
I did not modify torrc.

Read full topic
item.source: Xmpp no longer works via tor

item.title: Xmpp no longer works via tor
item.dc:creator: xin
item.description:
Browsers, mail work normally. xmpp works neither via pidgin nor via psi. It seems that tor just does not support xmpp or tsl\ssl.

Read full topic
item.source: Xmpp no longer works via tor

item.title: Xmpp no longer works via tor
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

are other connections possible? Did you modify torrc lately? And what do you get under arm?

Have a nice day,

Ego
